analysis.description:
CrystalReignShard.tileDrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- winners[winList].transfer(bonusETH.div(64)) (/unique_chucks/14/0x5108e432d40d34a4d0ed88c12e83db0e571bfc75.sol#225)

CrystalReignShard.compWallet should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x5108e432d40d34a4d0ed88c12e83db0e571bfc75.sol#156-158)
CrystalReignShard.dropWallet should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x5108e432d40d34a4d0ed88c12e83db0e571bfc75.sol#155)

CrystalReignShard.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/14/0x5108e432d40d34a4d0ed88c12e83db0e571bfc75.sol#152-153)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/14/0x5108e432d40d34a4d0ed88c12e83db0e571bfc75.sol#210-213:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/14/0x5108e432d40d34a4d0ed88c12e83db0e571bfc75.sol#213:
	- Usage of "throw" should be replaced with "revert()"
